Code: EXEC SQL SELECT FONTE, PROTSINI, DAC, NUM_APOL_SINISTRO, NUM_APOLICE, NRENDOS, CODSUBES, NRCERTIF, DIGCERT, IDTPSEGU, RAMO, CODCAU FROM SEGUROS.V0MESTSINI WHERE NUM_APOLICE = :NUM_APOLICE AND NRCERTIF = :NRCERTIF AND CODSUBES = :CODSUBES AND IDTPSEGU = :IDTPSEGU AND CODCAU IN (19,20,21,22,23,24,25,26,27) AND SITUACAO <> '2' ORDER BY TIMESTAMP DESC END SQL
